component.name: CurrentSongReader
component.script:
sub init() m.top.functionName = "getsong" end sub
sub getsong() 'print "getSong uri: " + m.top.uri if m.top.uri = "" return end if
readInternet = createObject("roUrlTransfer") readInternet.SetCertificatesFile("common:/certs/ca-bundle.crt") readInternet.AddHeader("X-Roku-Reserved-Dev-Id", "") readInternet.InitClientCertificates() readInternet.setUrl(m.top.uri) response = parseJson(readInternet.GetToString())
m.top.songlabel.text = "Song: " + response.song m.top.artistlabel.text = "Artist: " + response.artist end sub
